name: Gift Ribbon
author: iteamweb

sections.description: Add a image with a link on the top right corner of your website. The image and the link that has to appear can be configured from the backend.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Gift Ribbon plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or download directly from plugins page
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The Gift Ribbon menu will appear on the left menu
  4. Image and link that has to appear on the top right can be configured.
  5. If you want to remove the image appearing, please disable the plugin

short_description: Add a image with a link on the top right corner of your website
description: Add a image with a link on the top right corner of your website. The image and the link that has to appear can be configured from the backend.

screenshots.caption: This is how the image will appear on your screen
